title: Banaz: A Love Story
writer: Darin Prindle, Honora Foah, Hamilton Craig, Andrew Smith
actors: Nazir Afzal, Bobbie Cheema, Andy Craig, Caroline Goode
plot: This is a documentary film chronicling the brutal Honour Killing of Banaz Mahmod, a young British Kurdish woman in London, killed by her own family for choosing a life for herself.
